title: Introduction to C Programming
description: It is a general-purpose language used to develop software, such as databases, operating systems, compilers, and many more.

title: Introduction to Algorithms
description: Algorithms are a set of programming instructions, known as inputs and outputs, that allow a data operation to function precisely at every execution.

title: Introduction to C++ for DSA
description: C++ is a programming languages, mainly used in the development of high-performance applications, Operating Systems, and games.

title: Basic Data Structures
description: Data Structures are used to store data that we can access them in a very efficient way.Data Structures used in the C++ Programming language.

title: Introduction to OOP Python
description: Object-oriented programming (OOP) is a method of structuring a program by bundling related properties and behaviors into individual objects.

title: Software Engineering
description: It is the process of developing, testing and deploying applications to solve problems by adhering to a set of engineering principles and practices.

title: AWS, Cloud Computing
description: AWS is a comprehensive, evolving cloud computing platform provided by Amazon that includes a mixture of iIaaS, PaaS and SaaS offerings.

title: Database (MySQL)
description: MySQL is an open-source relational database management system.MySQL is ideal for both small and large applications.

title: Problem-Solving Part
description: Problem-solving includes three main parts: identifying the problem, analyzing possible solutions, and deciding on the best course of action.
